price: 28. Waxay odhan: Waa goorma kala xukunku haddaad run sheegaysaan?
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡفَتۡحُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna matā hādhā al-fatḥu in kuntum ṣādiqīna
